text: The pirates were about to board a vessel in the Gulf of Aden when they were apprehended. Last month, India's navy drew criticism after sinking a Thai fishing trawler that had been commandeered hours earlier by pirates, but the navy says it fired in self-defence. Somali pirates have become increasingly brazen, and recently seized a Saudi supertanker loaded with e75m worth of crude oil.
title: The Indian navy has captured 23 Somalian pirates.
